adDetails: If you are looking for help with your divorce and don't want all the drama of two lawyers fighting it out in court, mediation is your answer. We offer a less stress, less expensive solution to getting divorced, and can help you from start to finish. Our attorneys are experienced Family Law Lawyers and can file all the paperwork on your behalf, and will assist you in negotiating the terms of your divorce so that both parties get a solution they can live with. If mediation is not right for you, we also have attorneys that can act as your advocate and protect your rights in court if needed. Call now for a free one hour phone consultation. Santa Clara Mediation, taking the fight out of your divorce! www.santaclaramediation.com show contact info
